Translations.Text: Ni$ lmumnin rebêen
Wid ipéallan s wannuz
wid ijunben yir awal
wid ipzekkin
wid iêurben af tuzzuft nnsen
siwa ar tlawin nnsen, ne$ taklatin nnsen. Akka, ur degsen tiyta
wid ib$an sennig waya, widak zegren tilisa
wid ipqadaren lamanat nnsen, u lemâahda nnsen
wid iwennâen tiéilla nnsen
D wigi ay d iweôôaten
wid ara iweôten Loennet, degs ad wekkôen
Ni$ Nexleq amdan, seg ufûil n talaxt
sinna, Nerra t d tiqqit deg umekkan n laman
sinna, tiqqit Nxelq ip d argen; d$a, argen Nxelq it d acelleqluq; d$a, acelleqluq Nxelq it d i$san; d$a, Nessels aksum i yi$san. Sinna, Nxelq it d lxelq amaynut. Ad Ibarek Öebbi, Imxeyyeô ixellaqen
Sinna, deffir waya, war ccekk, a ppemmtem
Sinna, ih, ass n tnekra, a d tu$alem
Ni$ Nexleq, sennig wen, ûa iberdan. Ur Nelli, $ef uxlaq, seg i$wefliyen
Nessader ed, seg igenni, aman s lmizan. Naâteq iten di tmurt. Nezmer a ten Nessôuê
Nxelq awen, yissen, leonanat n tezdayin akked téuôin; degsen, i kunwi, aîas n yizwayen, teppeppem segsen
Akked ttejôa, id iff$en seg udrar n Sina. Teppak ed zzit u ddhin, i wid iteppen
Ih, di lmal, aselmed i kunwi. Nesswa kwen s wayen illan deg iâabbav nnsen. Aîas n uba$uô degsen, i kunwi. Teppeppem segsen
Fellasen, u $ef lbabuô, ppawin kwen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nuê i ugdud is. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Âabdet Öebbi. Ur awen illi ôebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepêezziben ara
Nnan imvebbôen ijehliyen, n ugdud is: "wagi d amdan kan, am kunwi; ib$a a d ikk sennig wen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, a d Issers lmalayek. Ur nesli s waya, ar lejdud nne$ imezwura
Neppa d argaz kan aôehbani. Qaôaâet ep, tallit kan
Inna: "a Mass iw! Awes iyi, skaddben iyi

Nweêêa yas d: "eûnaâ lbabuô, ger wallen nne£, s uweêêi nne£. Mi d iusa lameô nne£, la pfeggiven igwefran, d ihedman, awi degs, tayuga n yal ûûenf, akked twacult ik, siwa wid, segsen, i$ef id izwar wawal. Ur iyI d steqsay af wid idensen, nitni, war ccekk, ad pwa$evsen
Mi tâanncev di lbabur, keçç akked wid illan yidek, ini: ccekôan i Öebbi i $ Iselken seg ugdud imednas
Ini: "a Mass iw! Ssers iyi deg umekkan iôqan; Keçç Tifev akw wid issrusun
War ccekk, ayagi, d issekniyen, u Nekwni, Nezga d wid ipjeôôiben
Sinna, Nxelq ed, deffir sen, isuta nniven
Nuzen asen d amazan, segsen: "âabdet Öebbi, ur tesâim ôebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepêezzibem ara
Nnan imvebbôen ijehliyen n ugdud is, wid iugin u inekôen timlilit n laxeôt, wid Ne$na di tmeddurt n ddunit: "wagi d amdan kan am kunwi, itepp seg wayen teppeppem, itess seg wayen teppessem
Ma tessemêessem i umdan i kwen icban, war ccekk, kunwi seg imexsuôen
Day i wen iâahed ard a d teff$em mara temmtem, tu$alem d akal, d i$san
Ibâad, Ibâad, ayen i wen ippuwaââden
I illan kan, d tameddurt n ddunit. A nemmet, a nidir, nekwni ur d neppenkar
Neppa, d argaz kan id igren tikerkas $ef Öebbi. Nekwni, ur numin yis
Inna: "a Mass iw! Awes iyi, skaddben iyi
Inna: "garane$ d cwiî, a d gwrin di nndama
Iwwet iten usu$u, s tidep. Nerra ten d rrmim. Err akin, agdud imednas
Sinna, Nxelq ed, deffir sen, isuta nniven
Lois ur d isseqôab, ur iswexxiô, lajel is
Sinna, Nuzen ed imazanen nne£, wa deffir wa. Yal tikelt ideg ara d ias umazan, ar lois is, a t skiddben. Nerra ten mestebâan, Nerra ten d tidyanin. Err akin, agdud ur neppamen
Sinna, Nuzen ed Musa akked gma s Haôun, s issekniyen nne£, akked udabu n ûûeê
eô Ferâun akked imvebbôen is. Sme$wôen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud amzuxxi
Nnan: "Day a namen sin imdanen am nekwni, u agdud nnsen d aklan nne
Skaddben ten, d$a u$alen seg wid ipwan$an
Ni$ Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, amar ad pwanhun
Nerra mmi s n Meryem, akked imma s, d assekni. Nesduri ten di ti$ilt, degs laman d waman
A yimazanen, eççet seg wayen imaânen, xedmet ayen ilhan, Nek, èôi$ ayen txeddmem
Lois agi nnwen, s tidep, d lois yiwen. Nek, d Mass nnwen, ihi êezbet iyI
Bvan lameô nnsen garasen, mi mfaôaqen. Yal akabar ifôeê s wayla s
Eoo iten di maylellif nnsen, tallit kan
Day $ilen mi sen Nefka ayla, tarwa
ad asen Nezzazal lxiô? Xaîi, ur faqen
Ih, wid, si tugwdi n Mass nnsen, pêadaren
wid iumnen s issekniyen n Mass nnsen
wid ur nepcarak i Mass nnsen
wid ippaken ayen fkan, ulawen nnsen ugaden mi, nitni, ad u$alen ar Mass nnsen
widak, pêirin ar lxiô u, $uôes, zeggwiren
Ur Nepkellif taôwiêt, siwa ar wayen iwumi tezmer. £uône£ Tazmamt, tessawal tidep. Nitni ur twadensen
Maca, ulawen nnsen di maylellif, $ef tagi. U rnan yir igiten i waya, a ten xedmen
Alamma, mi Nesâadda aâaqeb $ef isâayen nnsen, a d su$en
Ur psu$ut, ass agi, kunwi, segne$, ur tepwasellkem
Ni$ mlan awen issekniyen iW, trewlem asen
tesme$wôem iman nnwen fellasen. Teppaâwazem, tekkatem
Day ur meyyzen ara Awal? Day ur ten id iusa ara, wayen ur d nusi ar lejdud nnsen imezwura
Ne$ day ur ssinen ara amazan nnsen, imi t nekôen
Ne$ qqaôen: "ikcem it loenn"? Xaîi, iusa ten id s tidep. Tegwti degsen, kerhen tidep
Lemmer tedda tidep d lhawiyyat nnsen, war ccekk, tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan degsen, ad fesden. Xaîi, Nebbwi yasen d asmekti nnsen. Nitni asmekti nnsen ooan t
Ne$, ad asen tessutrev taqdiât? Ppif taqdiât n Mass ik. Neppa Yif akw iôeééaqen
Keçç, s tidep, la ten tneccdev s abrid uwqim
Wid ur numin ara s laxeôt, s tidep, ff$en i ubrid
Xas Nêun fellasen, u Nekkes asen ccqa nnsen, ad vellelen di leqheô nnsen, ad ddebdeben
Ni$ Nesâadda fellasen aâaqeb. Ur knan i Mass nnsen, ur nujen
Armi, mara asen Nelli tabburt uâaqeb iqesêen, imiren, degs, ad aysen
Neppa i wen Ixelqen timesliwt, iéôi, ulawen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Neppa ikwen Iwezzâen di tmurt. £uôeS ara tepwafesrem
Neppa i Issidiren, i Ineqqen. IneS afraz n yiv akked wass. Day ur tefhimem ara
Xaîi. Nnan akken d nnan imezwura
Nnan: "Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, d i$san, day a $ d ssekren
Ni$ ippuâahed wayagi i nekwni, akw, zik, i imezwura nne$. Ayagi, siwa d timucuha imezwura
Ini: "wi p ilan tmurt, akked wayen illan degs, ma tessnem
A d inin: "d Öebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ini: "anwa ay d Mass n ûa igenwan? Mass n usgeld ameqwôaêan
A d inin: "d Öebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur tepêezzibem ara
Ini: "anwa i Isâan tagelda n yal cci, ger ifassen iS; Neppa Ipêarab, ur illi uêareb fellaS, ma teppissinem
A d inin: "d Öebbi". Ini: "ihi, acimi tepwamelkem
Xaîi! Nefka yasen tidep, nitni, war ccek, d ikeddaben
Ur Isâi Öebbi mmi S. Ur illi ôebbi ar tama S. Mulac yal ôebbi ad iawi ayen id ixleq, wa ad iagwar wa. Gedha s Öebbi, seg wayen id snulfuyen
Amusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir. D Aâlayan, sennig wayen pcaraken
Ini: "a Mass iw! Lemmer a yi d Tesseknev acu i sen ippuâahden
A Mass iw, ur iyi Ppara deg ugdud imednas
S tidep, Nezmer ad ak Nessken acu i sen Nâahed
Err akin tucmip s lfayeq. Nekwni Neéôa, sennig wiyav, ayen d snulfuyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Ëerz iyi seg u$wayen n ccwaîen. Êë
Ëerz iyi, a Mass iw! Ur dgi ppilin
Armi, mi d tusa tmeppant yiwen degsen, inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi
amar ad xedme$ ayen ilhan deg wayen ooi$". Xaîi, d awal kan id inna. Tella, deffir es, tse$lit, alamma d ass n tnekra
Ma ûuven di lbuq, assen, ur ppemyilin, ur pmesteqsayen
Wid iwumi ééay lmizan nnsen, nitni rebêen
Wid iwumi fessus lmizan nnsen, d nitni i issexsôen iman nnsen. Di Loahennama ad wekkôen
A ppesser$ tmes udmawen nnsen, ad asen zelgen icenfiren
Day ur awen qaren ara issekniyen iW, wanag la ten tnekôem
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! I$leb ane$ ccum nne$. Nella d agdud im$eôqen
A Mass nne$! Ssuffe$ ane$ segs. Ma nesnager, ihi, d imednas ay nella
Ad Yini: "qqimet degs, ur pmeslayet
Ih, illa urbaâ n imdanen iW i iqqaôen: "a Mass nne$! Numen. Semmeê ane$, Ëun fella$, Keçç Tifev akw wid ipêunun
Tettihim fellasen armi i wen sseppun asmekti W, u tdessem degsen
Nek, assa, Kufa$ ten $ef wayen ûebôen. D nitni, war ccekk, ay d imerbaê
Inna: "acêal iseggwasen i teqqimem deg wakal
Nnan: "Neqqim ass, ne$ ur ibbwiv wass, steqsi wid iêepben
Inna: "cwiî kan ay teqqimen, lemmer, s tidep, day tessinem
Day t$ilem Nxelq ikwen, kan, di rrayaâ; ar ur d teppu$alem $uône£
Ay Meqqweô Öebbi, Agellid, Tidep! Ur illi ôebbi, siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ukyis
Win inaâôen, ar tama n Öebbi, ôebbi nniven, ur isâi ppbut fellas, aqeîîi s ar Mass is kan. Ih, ur rebêen ara ijehliyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Semmeê u Ëun. Keçç, Tifev akw wid ipêunun
Tasurep, Nessader ip id, Nêeppem ip id; Nessader ed, degs, issekniyen iberrzen, amar a d temmektim
Tin ne$ win iznan, jekwvet, yal yiwen segsen, tawinest iberdan; ur kwen p$aven $ef udem n Öebbi, ma tellam tumnem s Öebbi akked wass aneggaru. Arbaâ n lmumnin, ad yili d anagi uâaqeb nnsen
Win iznan ur ippa$ siwa tin iznan, ne$ tamcarekt. Tin iznan ur p ippa$ siwa win iznan, ne$ amcarek. Ipwagdel waya i lmumnin
Wid itehmen tiâaôviyin, d$a ur d bbwin kué inagan, jekwvet pen îamet iberdan; ur qeblet ccada nnsen, d awez$i. Widen d iballa$en
Kkes ed wid isteôoâen, deffir waya, u xedmen lfayeq. Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Wid itehmen tilawin nnsen, ur sâin inagan, siwa iman nnsen, yiwen segsen ad iggal s Öebbi, kué iberdan, ar neppa d bab n tidep
akked ubrid wis smus ar a t Ixzu Öebbi ma iskaddeb
Ur teppuâaqeb tmeîîut, ma teggul s Öebbi, kué iberdan, ar neppa seg wid iskadben
akked ubrid, wis smus ar fellas zzâaf n Öebbi, ma issawel ed tidep
A lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Öebbi akked uêunu S! Öebbi, s tidep, Issuruf, d Bab n ûûwab
Ih, wid isweûlen tikerkas, d agraw segwen. Ur p$ilit d cceôô i kunwi, xaîi, d lxiô nnwen. Yal yiwen, degsen, ibbwi ayen ibbwi ubekkav. Aâaqeb abarar i win, segsen, i ibbwin amur ameqwôaêan
A lemmer lmumnin, argaz tameîîut, mi s slan, meyyzen lxiô, deg iman nnsen, u nnan: "wagi d tikerkas ibanen
A lemmer d bbwin, fellas, kué inagan! Ma ur d bbwin ara inagan, ar Öebbi, wigi, d ikeddaben
Lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Öebbi akked uêunu S, di ddunit akked laxeôt, a ppesâaddim aâaqeb abarar $ef wayen i$ef temcawaôem
Mi p id teggarem s yilsawen nnwen, u teqqaôen s imawen nnwen ayen ur tessinem, t$ilem d ulac. Neppa, ar Öebbi, d abarar
Lemmer, mi as teslam, tennam: "ur a$ issefk ara umeslay $ef waya! Gedha s yiseK! Wagi d acehrir abarar
Inuba kwen Öebbi ur teppalsem, am akka, d awez$i, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ipbeggin awen Öebbi issekniyen. Öebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n ûûwab
Ih, wid ib$an a d iazel lâaô, ar wid iumnen, fellasen aâaqeb aqeôêan di ddunit, di laxeôt. Öebbi Issen, kunwi ur tessinem
A lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Öebbi akked uêunu S! U Öebbi d Umâin, Ipêunu

A wid iumnen! Ur teddut di lateô n Cciîan. Win iteddun di lateô n Cciîan, ar la iteddu di lâaô akked tuccva. Lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Öebbi akked uêunu S, ur ippizdig degwen yiwen, d awez$i. Maca, Öebbi Izzizdig win i S ihwan. Öebbi Issel, d Amusnaw

Wid, degwen, iwumi ippunefk lfevl akked terkunt, ur pgalan $ef tikci i llzem, i ime$ban, i wid iunagen deg ubrid n Öebbi. Ad semmêen, ad ssurfen. Day ur têemmlem ara mara awen Isemmeê Öebbi? Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ih, wid ipqeôôiven tilawin zeddigen, istehzan, iumnen, ad pwaxzun di ddunit, di laxeôt. Fellasen aâaqeb abarar
Ass ideg ara d cehhden $ef igiten nnsen, ilsawen nnsen, ifassen nnsen, ivaôen nnsen
assen, ad asen Ifk Öebbi ayen ppalasen, s tidep. Ad éôen ar Öebbi d Tidep ibanen
Yir tlawin i yir irgazen, yir irgazen i yir tlawin. Tilawin n lâali i irgazen n lâali, irgazen lâali i tlawin n lâali. Wigi ur ppkan deg wayen qqaôen. I nitni, ssmaê akked ôôeéq ukyis
A wid iumnen! Ur keçmet ixxamen ur nelli nnwen, alamma s tsriê, u alamma tselmem $ef imawlan nnsen. Ppif akka i kunwi, amar a d tesmektim
Ma ur tufim êedd degsen, ur keçmet alamma s tsriê. Ma nnan awen d: "u$alet", u$alet. Yif it wakka i ûûfawa nnwen. Öebbi Iéôa ayen txeddmem
Ulac u$ilif fellawen ma tkecmem ixxamen ur nepwazde$, ma tella t$awsa nnwen degsen. Öebbi Iéôa acu d teqqaôem, u wacu teppeffrem
Ini i wid iumnen ad brun i wallen nnsen, ad ssôen tuzzuft nnsen. Yif it wakka i ûûfawa nnsen. Öebbi, s tidep, Iéôa ayen xeddmen

Ini i tid iumnen ad brunt i wallen nnsent, ad ssôent tuzzuft nnsent, ur d sskanent, di zzin nnsent, siwa ayen d ivehôen segs, ad $umment idmaren nnsent. Ur d sskanent ccbuê nnsent, siwa i irgazen nnsent, ne$ ibabaten nnsent, ne$ im$aôen nnsent, ne$ iqcicen nnsent, ne$ irbiben nnsent, ne$ atmaten nnsent, ne$ iqcicen n watmaten nnsent, ne$ wid n tsetmatin nnsent, ne$ tiqeddacin nnsent, ne$ taklatin nnsent, ne$ iqeddacen imudduzen, ne$ arrac ur nelleméi. Ur kkatent dderz, ad ipwassen zzin nnsent uffir. Steôoâet akw i Öebbi, a lmumnin, amar a prebêem
Jewoet i iâzriyen nnwen, akked wid imaânen seg waklan nnwen, akked teklatin nnwen. Ma d ime$ban ay llan, a ten Iôéeq Öebbi, s lfevl iS. Öebbi d Ajemmal, d Amusnaw

Wid ur nufa ara ar a$en, ad ûebôen ar ten id Iôéeq Öebbi, s lfevl iS. Wid, seg waklan nnwen, i ib$an ad asen tarum aserreê, arut asen ma teéôam ten, d at lxiô ay llan. Fket asen seg ayla i wen Ifka Öebbi. Ur pêeppimet $ef teklatin nnwen, tiquêbit, i rrbeê nnwen di tmeddurt n ddunit, ma b$ant tezdeg. Ma têeppmen, Öebbi, deffir uêeppem nnsent, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ni$ Nessader awen ed issekniyen iberrzen, akked umedya n wid iâacen uqbel nnwen, d anabi i wid ipêezziben

Öebbi d tafat n tmurt akked igenwan. Amedya n tafat iS d takwap degs taftilt. Taftilt daxel n tqeôâap. Taqeôâap, amzun d itri acôaôaq, tecâal it ttejôa iôqan, tazemmurt ur nelli n ugmuv ne$ n utaram. Qôib a pfet zzit is, ur p tennul tmes. Tafat $ef tafat. Ippawi Öebbi win i S ihwan ar tafat iS. Ippak ed Öebbi imedyaten i medden. Öebbi Iéôa yal cci
Deg ixxamen i Ib$a Öebbi ad ufraren, ideg ara d immekti yisem iS, sbuccuâen T ssbeê, tameddit
Irgazen ur tes$afal ttjaôa, ne$ ssuq, $ef usmekti n Öebbi, $ef téallit, $ef zzakat; ppagwaden ass, ideg ara nehwwalen wallen akked wulawen
Iwakken a ten Ikafi Öebbi $ef wayen xeddmen d amxallef, ad asen Irnu si lfevl iS. Öebbi Ip$iti win i S ihwan, war aktili
Igiten n wid ijehlen, am aylal deg uza$aô. Win ifuden, ad i$il d aman. Alamma mi ibbwev $uôes, ur ippaf acemma. A n iaf Öebbi, Issuli as leêsab is. Öebbi Ip$awal deg uqeîîi
Ne$ am tillas di yill le$miq. T$umm it lmuja, sufella lmuja, sufella asigna. Tillas sennig tiyav. Ma issuffe$ ed afus is, ur issawev a t iwali. Win iwumi ur Iga ara Öebbi tafat, ur isâi tafat
Day ur twalav ara, sbuccuâen Öebbi i illan di tmurt akked igenwan? Ifrax deg waffug. Issen taéallit akked usbuccaâ n yal yiwen. Öebbi Iéôa ayen xeddmen
N Öebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. £uô öÖebbi tu$alin

Ur twalav ara Öebbi Isselêay asigna, sinna, a t Izdi, sinna, a t Issem$weô? D$a a pwaliv ageffur a d iffe$ si zdaxel is. Isrusu d, seg idurar igenni, abruri. Ad Iwwet yis, win i S ihwan, a t Iveôôef $ef win i S ihwan. Tafat n lebôaq iS qôib a ppeglu s yiéôi
Öebbi Ismizwar iv akked wass. Deg wayagi, s tidep, d aselmed i wid isâan iéôi
Öebbi Ixleq akw lêayawan, seg waman. Garasen, illa win ippeênunufen $ef uâabbuv is, win ileêêun $ef sin ivaôôen, win ileêêun $ef kué. Ixelleq Öebbi ayen i S ihwan. Öebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
Ni$ Nessader ed issekniyen iberrzen. Öebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan, ar ubrid uwqim
Qqaôen: "numen s Öebbi akked Umazan, nu$ awal". Sinna, deffir waya, iwexxeô urbaâ segsen. Wigi ur llin d lmumnin
Mi pwanecden ar Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ad Iêudd garasen, arbaâ segsen iwexxeô
Ma sâan lêeqq, a d asen $uôes, d imvuâen
Day helken wulawen nnsen, ne$ cukken, ne$ ugaden a ten Isneêyaf Öebbi akked Umazan iS? Xaîi, widak d imednas
Timenna n lmumnin, mara ssutren aêuddu n Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ad Iêudd garasen, d tigi kan: "nesla, nôuva". D wigi ay d imerbaê
Win iôuvan Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ippagwaden Öebbi, ipêezziben, nitni d isaâdiyen
Ggulen s Öebbi, tagallit meqqwôen, ar ma tumôev asen, ard ad ff$en, war ccekk. Ini: "ur pgallat, annuz ipwassen. Öebbi, s tidep, Iéôa ayen txeddmem
Ini: "ôavit Öebbi, ôavit Amazan". Ma wexxôen, fellas, neppa, ayen kan i s sbabben, fellawen kunwi ayen i wen sbabben. Ma tôuvam T, a ppeppwanhum. I iwatan i Umazan, siwa awal ipbegginen

Iâahed Öebbi, i wid iumnen segwen, u xedmen ayen ilhan, ara ten Irr, war ccekk, d igensas di tmurt, akken Irra wid i ten id izwaren; ara ad asen Isseqâad ddin nnsen i$ef i ten Iôuva; ar ad asen Issegwri laman, deffir tugdi. Âabden iyI, ur iyI pcaraken acemma. Wid ijehlen, deffir waya, widak d iballa$en
Beddet i téallit, zekkit, a$et awal i Umazan. Amar aêunu fellawen
£uôwat a p$ilem wid ijehlen sfunnugen di tmurt. Axxam nnsen d times. A tu$alin tucmip

A wid iumnen! S uâammed nnwen ara d kecmen, $uôwen, waklan nnwen akw wid, degwen, ur nebli$ ara, krav iberdan ideg ur telsim ara: uqbel taéallit n tafrara, $ef îîhuô mara tekksem iceîîiven, deffir téallit n lâica. Ulac u$ilif fellawen ne$ fellasen, ma wa iéuô wa, deffir lewqat agi. Akka i wen d Ibeggen Öebbi issekniyen. Öebbi Iéôa, d Bab n ûûwab
Ma bel$en warrac nnwen, s uâammed nnwen, am wid i ten id izwaren. Akka i wen d Ibeggen Öebbi issekniyen iS. Öebbi Iéôa, d Bab n ûûwab
Ulac u$ilif $ef tâuqaô i iâaddan i jwao, ma kksent iceîîiven nnsent, mebla ma sseknent ccbuê nnsent. Ma setêant, yif it i nitenti. Öebbi Issel, d Amusnaw

Ur telli tiyta deg uder$al, ne$ deg urejdal, ne$ deg umuvin, ne$ degwen, ma teççam deg ixxamen nnwen, deg wid n ibabaten nnwen, deg wid n tyimmatin nnwen, deg wid n watmaten nnwen, deg wid n tsetmatin nnwen, deg wid iâammiten nnwen, deg wid n tâammitin nnwen, deg wid ixaliten nnwen, deg wid n txaltitin nnwen, deg wid ideg tesâam tisura, ar uêbib nnwen. Ulac u$ilif fellawen ma teççam d agraw, ne$ d ifôiden. Mara tkecmen ixxamen, msalamet s wazul iôqan, aêmayan, s$uô Öebbi. Akka i wen d Ibeggen Öebbi issekniyen. Amar a pfehmem

Lmumnin, siwa wid iumnen s Öebbi akked Umazan iS. Ma llan yides $ef lameô iten icerken, ur pôuêun alamma ssutren as tsriê. Ih, wid i k issuturen tsriê, d nitni i iumnen s Öebbi akked Umazan iS. Ma ssutren ak tsriê, $ef kra iten iaânan, serreê i win i k ihwan, segsen. Ssuter i Öebbi ad sen Isemmeê. Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ur êepbet asiwwel garawen i Umazan, am mara temsawalem. Ih, Iéôa Öebbi wid, segwen, ippensaren s tuffra. Ad steêdren wid mgirrden lameô iS: ad ppuhewwlen, ne$ ad sâaddin aâaqeb aqeôêan
Ih, day maççi n Öebbi, i illan di tmurt akked igenwan? Ni$ Iéôa amek tellam $uôeS. Ass n tu$alin nnsen $uôeS, ad asen Imel d acu xedmen. Öebbi Issen yal cci
Ad Iôqu Win id Issadren afraz, i umdan iS, iwakken ad yili d aneddaô imavalen
Win Ilan tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan; ur Isâi mmi S; ur aS illi ucrik di tgelda. Ixleq yal cci, Iwezn it s lmizan
Ddmen, war Neppa, iôebbiten ur nexliq acemma. D nitni i ipwaxelqen. Ur pseyyin vveô ne$ aba$uô, i iman nnsen. Ur pseyyin di tmeppant ne$ di tmeddurt, ne$ di tnekra
Nnan wid ijehlen: "ayagi, d tikerkas kan. Isnulfa tent id, iâawen it, fellas, ugdud nniven. Ni$ densen u skaddben
Nnan: "d timucuha imezwura, i iura; qqaôen as tent ûûbeê, tameddit
Ini: "Issader it id, Win Issnen sser n tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa, s tidep, Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Nnan: "d acut Umazan agi i iteppen lqut, iteddun ar leswaq? A lemmer id irs $uôes lmelk, ara yilin yides d aneddaô
ne$ ippunefk as ugerruj, ne$ isâa aqwiô itepp segs"! Nnan imednas: "la teppeddum kan d urgaz iwumi sseêren
Wali amek id ppaken fellak imedyaten. Nnetlafen, ur zmiren ad pwanhun
Ad Iôqu Win ad ak Ifken, ma Irad, i ifen ayagi: leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Ad ak Issali lebôuo
Xaîi, nekôen imir. Nhegga d times i win inekôen imir
Mi ten twala si tama ibaâden, ad as slen s leêôaôa akked zzhir
Mara $lin degs, nitni pwarzen deg umekkan uqmiv, ad siwlen, dinna, i wangar
Ur ssawalet ara, assa, i yiwet n wangar, ssiwlet i waîas n wangaren
Ini: "ppif ayagi, ne$ Loennet n lebda i Nâahed i wid ipêezziben? D neppat ay d arraz, ay d taggara, i nitni
I nitni degs, ayen i sen ihwan, i lebda. D lemâahda i$ef Iuksan Mass ik
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, nitni akked wid âabden, war Öebbi, ad Yini: "d kunwi i itelfen imdanen iW agi, ne$ d nitni i iff$en abrid
A d inin: "gedha s yiseK! Ur a$ issefk a neddu d bab, war Keçç. Maca, T$atev ten, nitni akked imezwura nnsen, armi ppun asmekti, u$alen d agdud ixeûôen
Atan nekôen kwen $ef wayen d tennam. Ihi ur tezmirem i tsensert, ne$ i leslak. Win idensen, degwen, a Nessukk fellas, aâaqeb ameqwôan
Ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, imazanen, mebla ma llan teppen lqut, u teddun ar leswaq. Nerra kwen, wa ihewwel wa, ma a pûebôem. Mass ik Izga la d Ismuqul
